name: Roly's Revenge
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a destructive pill bug on a rampage? Welcome to Roly's Revenge, the ultimate bug-bashing adventure game! In this game, players control a pill bug on a mission to chase and kill enemies while building up large combos.

As the player progresses through the level, they will encounter different types of enemies that require different elemental attacks to defeat them. The player can use rock-paper-scissors game mechanics with these attacks to defeat bosses and achieve the highest score yet!

This is the first jam we have joined in any meaningful way. Feedback is appreciated!

The controls are:

  • Left Click for a fire attack
  • Middle Mouse Button for a water based attack
  • Right Click for a ground attack

and the game can be played within your browser.

The credits are:

  • ABScratchy - Sound Effects
  • Champ - Sound Effects
  • June - Narrative Design
  • Kaldi - Lead, Game Dev & Design
  • Letholor - Game Testing
  • Marek Miller - Art
  • Unconscious Motifs - Sound Design & Music

and we made everything ourselves.
